page.title: 16CLUBS
page.content: There are many organisations catering for social, educational, artistic and sporting interests from childhood to old age. They meet in the Church, Church Hall, Legion Hall, Tolzey Hall, School, Day Centre, homes and outdoors. The list includes Badminton, Band, Bellringers, Brownies, Clay Pigeon Shooting, Cricket Club, Conservative Assn., Flower arranging, 2 Football Clubs, Friends of the School, Horticultural Soc., Labour Party, Liberal Assn., Local History Soc., Luncheon Club, Marshfield Soc., Mothers' Union, Mummers, Over 60's, Pantomime Players, Playgroup,Poulson's Farm Saddle Club, Red Cross, Royal British Legion, Toddlers Group, Women's Institute, Workers' Education Assn., Yoga and a busy committee raising money for a proposed new Community Centre.
